title: Darkstream: Alt-Right and Identity
author: VD
content_html:
Tonight at 7 PM Eastern I’ll be talking about the Alt-Right and what the future likely holds for it in light of the debacles, successes, and revelations of the last six months.

UPDATE: the replay link is here.
